verses.text:
The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which \w stretcheth|strong="H5186"\w* forth the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and layeth the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w formeth|strong="H3335"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* him.

Behold, I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* a \w cup|strong="H5592"\w* of \w trembling|strong="H7478"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, when they shall be in the \w siege|strong="H4692"\w* both against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add and\add* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 12.2 \ft trembling: or, slumber, or, poison\f*\f + \fr 12.2 \ft when…: or, and also against Judah shall he be which shall be in siege against Jerusalem\f*

¶ And in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* a \w burdensome|strong="H4614"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* for all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: all that \w burden|strong="H6006"\w* themselves with it shall be cut in \w pieces|strong="H8295"\w*, though all the \w people|strong="H1471"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* be gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* against it.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* every \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* with \w astonishment|strong="H8541"\w*, and his \w rider|strong="H7392"\w* with \w madness|strong="H7697"\w*: and I will \w open|strong="H6491"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* every \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with \w blindness|strong="H5788"\w*.

And the \w governors|strong="H0441"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, The \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \add shall be\add* my \w strength|strong="H0556"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 12.5 \ft The inhabitants…: or, There is strength to me and to the inhabitants, etc\f*

¶ In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w make|strong="H7760"\w* the \w governors|strong="H0441"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* like an \w hearth|strong="H3595"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* among the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and like a \w torch|strong="H3940"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in a \w sheaf|strong="H5995"\w*; and they shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, on the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* and on the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*: and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* again in her own place, \add even\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* also shall \w save|strong="H3467"\w* the \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, that the \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and the \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* of the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* do not \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* \add themselves\add* against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w defend|strong="H1598"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and he that is \w feeble|strong="H3782"\w* among them at that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall be as \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add shall be\add* as \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.  +  r 12.8  t feeble: or, abject: Heb. fallen *

¶ And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* I will \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And I will \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* and of \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*: and they shall \w look|strong="H5027"\w* upon me whom they have \w pierced|strong="H1856"\w*, and they shall \w mourn|strong="H4553"\w* for him, as one \w mourneth|strong="H5594"\w* for \add his\add* \w only|strong="H3173"\w* \add son\add*, and shall be in \w bitterness|strong="H4843"\w* for him, as one that is in \w bitterness|strong="H4843"\w* for \add his\add* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall there be a \w great|strong="H1431"\w* \w mourning|strong="H4553"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, as the \w mourning|strong="H4553"\w* of \w Hadadrimmon|strong="H1910"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1237"\w* of \w Megiddon|strong="H4023"\w*.

And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w*, \w every|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w apart|strong="H0905"\w*; the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* apart, and their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* apart; the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* apart, and their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* apart;\f + \fr 12.12 \ft every…: Heb. families, families\f*

The \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* apart, and their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* apart; the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Shimei|strong="H8097"\w* apart, and their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* apart;\f + \fr 12.13 \ft of Shimei: or, of Simeon, as LXX\f*
All the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* that \w remain|strong="H7604"\w*, every \w family|strong="H4940"\w* apart, and their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* apart.
